channel.title: Chuunin Exam answers
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Chuunin Exam answers" - Not quite as good as this sites standards but it may help.

item.title: Re: Chuunin Exam answers
item.content:encoded:
If you went to the Future, and killed your future self, what crime would be committed? Murder

It is sunset in the forest. You need to cross three rivers to deliver a birthday cake to the HoCage. Which is the fastest mode of transportation? Taxi

How do you spot a ninja in the conversation? Screaming victims.

What is the answer to this question? Ninja

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: ^yo all those answers are wrong man

item.title: Re: Chuunin Exam answers
item.content:encoded:
Well here you go, I actually bothered to help ya guys out :P

If you went to the Future, and killed your future self, what crime would be committed? Murder

It is sunset in the forest. You need to cross three rivers to deliver a birthday cake to the HoCage. Which is the fastest mode of transportation? Taxi

How do you spot a ninja in the conversation? Screaming victims.

What is the answer to this question? Ninja

Best time to bingo? When they bingo you.

Why were you kicked out of your village? Spamming

Something insignificant has changed in the world of Billy. What do you do? C: Baw

Greatest ninja of all times: D: Flash

You haz a Ninja Flavor. What Flavor is it? Cheese

Who is the hottest kunoichi? Terri

item.title: Re: Chuunin Exam answers
item.content:encoded: Actually, the answer are randomly chosen when you first attempt the test. If and when you loop to season 2 and do that part of the exam again, odds are none of your answers will be the same anymore.

item.title: Chuunin Exam answers
item.content:encoded:
Well, since I have recently done them, I thought I should put in my notes. Please note that if it says D, it means the forth answer, and for the words, just look for the answer containing the word in it.
pinky
inac
b
scream
ninja
?
a
death
d
cake

Also, 'inac' is the start of an answer and ? was the one I didn't know. i thought this may help
